app.name: Calmora
app.tagline: Your mindful companion for mental wellness

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your soul garden
auth.signUpDescription: Create your account to start your mindfulness journey

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.profileDescription: Update your personal information and profile details
settings.profilePictureDescription: Click the camera icon to upload a new profile picture. Max size: 5MB.
settings.preferencesDescription: Customize your app experience and notification settings
settings.darkModeDescription: Toggle between light and dark themes
settings.pushNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications about your mood tracking
settings.emailUpdatesDescription: Receive weekly summaries and tips via email
settings.languageAndRegionDescription: Set your preferred language and regional settings
settings.deleteAccountDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.

index.heroSubtitle: A calming digital sanctuary for your mental wellness journey. Reflect, breathe, and grow your inner garden with every mindful step.
index.journeyStarts: Your journey to inner peace begins here
index.secureDescription: Create your secure account to access all mindfulness features. Your data is encrypted and protected with enterprise-grade security. Start your soul garden journey today.
index.securityFeatures: ‚úì End-to-end encryption ‚úì Password policies ‚úì Secure authentication
index.nurtureDescription: Discover tools designed to help you reflect, breathe, and grow your soul garden
index.tryDescription: Start your journey with a mood check-in and see your soul garden begin to grow
index.moreFeaturesDescription: Your soul garden will continue to evolve with new mindfulness tools
index.digitalSanctuary: Your digital sanctuary for mental wellness and soul growth
index.builtWithLove: Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è for your inner peace journey

mood.title: Tell me what's on your mind
mood.subtitle: Share your thoughts and I'll understand how you're feeling, then we can chat like friends üíù
mood.whatsHappening: What's happening in your world today?
mood.placeholder: Tell me anything that's on your mind... your day, your feelings, your thoughts, your dreams, your worries... I'm here to listen and understand üíô
mood.recording: Recording... I'm listening to your voice
mood.pleaseSomethingDesc: Tell me what's on your mind so I can understand how you're feeling.
mood.songsYoullLove: Songs I think you'll love right now:

journal.title: Guided Journaling
journal.subtitle: Explore your inner world through mindful writing
journal.titlePlaceholder: Give your entry a meaningful title...
journal.pleaseFillFieldsDesc: Add a title and some content to save your journal entry.
journal.entrySavedDesc: Your thoughts are now part of your soul garden's growth.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness & Breathing
mindfulness.subtitle: Find your center through guided breathing exercises
mindfulness.sessionCompleteDesc: You've completed {minutes} minutes of mindful breathing.

sounds.title: Peaceful Soundscapes
sounds.subtitle: Create your perfect ambient environment for relaxation and focus

garden.title: Your Soul Garden
garden.subtitle: Watch your mindfulness journey bloom as you complete activities
garden.gardenWaiting: Your garden is waiting to bloom...
garden.noGrowthHistoryDesc: Start your journey by checking your mood, writing in your journal, or practicing mindfulness!

dashboard.title: Your Wellness Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your journey and celebrate your growth
dashboard.noMoodEntries: No mood entries yet. Start checking in with yourself!
dashboard.basedOnRecent: Based on your recent mood entries

chat.title: AI Reflection Buddy
chat.subtitle: Gentle guidance, reflective prompts, and supportive chat
chat.sayHello: Say hello or pick a quick prompt below to start.

sleep.title: Sleep Zone
sleep.subtitle: A gentle place to wind down with a sleep timer and soothing ambience

features.emotionalCheckinsDesc: Voice or text-based mood tracking with AI sentiment analysis and personalized suggestions.
features.guidedJournalingDesc: Beautiful daily prompts for gratitude, reflection, and inner growth with encrypted privacy.
features.mindfulnessBreathingDesc: Guided meditations and breathing exercises for stress, anxiety, sleep, and focus.
features.soothingSoundscapesDesc: Calming music, nature sounds, and custom ambient blends based on your mood.
features.soulGardenGrowthDesc: Watch your virtual garden bloom as you complete mindful actions and reach milestones.
features.aiReflectionBuddyDesc: Chat with Calmora Bot for gentle guidance, reflection prompts, and positive reframing.
features.advancedAnalyticsDesc: Deep insights into your mood patterns and growth
features.sleepSanctuaryDesc: Bedtime stories, meditations, and sleep tracking

moodCheckIn.title: How are you feeling today?
moodCheckIn.subtitle: Check in with yourself and let your soul garden know how you're doing.
moodCheckIn.placeholder: Share what you're feeling or what happened today...
moodCheckIn.pleaseSelectMoodDesc: Choose how you're feeling today to continue.
moodCheckIn.moodLoggedDesc: Your soul garden appreciates your mindfulness.

journalPrompts.gratitudePrompt: What are three things you're grateful for today, and why do they matter to you?
journalPrompts.dailyReflectionPrompt: What was the highlight of your day? What would you do differently?
journalPrompts.personalGrowthPrompt: What did you learn about yourself today? How did you grow as a person?
journalPrompts.dreamsAspirationsPrompt: What dreams are calling to your heart? What steps can you take toward them?
journalPrompts.presentMomentPrompt: Describe this moment in detail. What do you see, hear, feel, and sense around you?

toast.profileUpdatedDescription: Your profile has been successfully updated.
toast.avatarUploadedDescription: Your profile picture has been updated.
toast.uploadFailedDescription: Failed to upload avatar. Please try again.
toast.fileTooLargeDescription: Please select an image smaller than 5MB.
toast.languageChangedDescription: The app language has been updated.
